abstract: Samuel G Freedman On Religion column reflects that the Jewish concept of 'pidyon shvuyim,' redeeming captives, primarily by paying a ransom, helped validate the steep price of Sergeant Gilad Shalit’s release from Hamas through a prisoner exchange.
snippet: The Jewish concept of “pidyon shvuyim” — redeeming the captives, primarily by paying a ransom — helped validate the steep price of Gilad Shalit’s liberation.
